name: 陳怡靜
objective: This course is for IEECUS international students. Students have an ability to manage Chinese language in daily life.In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. We'll start from daily scenario and get advanced Chinese phrase in writing skill.
